name: Missing Python wheel
outcome: Guardrails blocked deploy; manual mitigation required
observations: Wheel staging fallback lacked cp314 artifact for duckdb
Escalation to dependency owner required manual packaging
issues_found: No automated mirror promotion for emergency wheel builds
Guard output not linked to runbook step
mitigation_actions: Scheduled cron to mirror critical wheels to artifacts/cache/pip
Added runbook step to file upstream ticket when guard fails
